about_the_game:
Welcome to Elysium!

An Open-World Sci-Fi Crafting Survival Game

Elysium is a breathtaking archipelago shaped by a long-lost civilization. Explore mysterious islands infused with the energy of Elysiorite, craft cutting-edge technology, and survive against hostile creations that roam the land. The deeper you venture, the closer you’ll come to uncovering a power that reshaped this world forever.

Deep within Elysium lies Lithara, an ancient entity whose power predates the ruins. Its essence infuses the islands, influencing both the environment and the machines that guard it. The more you explore, the more you feel its presence. What is Lithara, and what role does it play in the fate of this world? Delve into the depths of Elysium to discover the truth and face the challenges it presents.

Elysiorite isn’t just a resource—it’s your lifeline. Harvest its energy to craft advanced tools, build high-tech suits, and unlock forgotten schematics hidden across the islands. Repair LIT Centers to activate dormant systems and access uncharted zones.

Create the ultimate base to secure your survival. Construct modular shelters, reinforce them with resources, and incorporate ancient Elythian structures into your designs. Adapt to the ever-growing dangers of the islands and showcase your ingenuity in a hostile environment.

Face off against robotic creations left behind by the Elythians. From relentless drones to colossal war machines, each battle tests your skill and strategy. Outthink, outmaneuver, and outlast these mechanical foes—or risk becoming another relic of this world.

Forge your path alone or with friends in co-op mode. Work together to restore LIT Centers, battle relentless robotic enemies, and uncover secrets hidden deep within the islands. Teamwork can be the difference between survival and failure.

Step into a world of survival, exploration, and innovation. Craft Elythian technology, battle relentless robotic foes, and piece together the secrets of a world unlike any other.

Add Elysium to your wishlist and prepare for the ultimate open-world crafting survival sci-fi adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an adventure that brings you to a mysterious island where lies the ruins of an ancient civilization. Build, fight, survive and discover how a newly discovered element on the island that gave Elythians a technological advantage also destroyed them.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, French, German, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
